main event: A witness reported observing a glowing object in the sky over Chagrin Falls, Ohio, on February 3, 1967.
interesting points: The object initially appeared as a stationary star with a reddish glow., It changed shape and color during the observation., The object moved slowly to the left, then reversed back to its original position., The witness described the object as possibly 20 to 30 feet in diameter., The entire sighting lasted 4-5 minutes with no sound detected.
witness description: A neighbor with a redacted name who reported seeing the object over the lake.
